name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. June O'BRYANT, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. June O’BRYANT, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Mark E. Kogan, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Sarah Vandenbraak, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 745
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. June O’BRYANT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 19, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
Mark E. Kogan, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Sarah Vandenbraak, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
